attributes.action: Stop Theresa May becoming the next prime minister
attributes.background: We call on the Tory MPs not to back Theresa Mays campaign as we feel she is the wrong person to lead the country out of the EU . We also call on the Tory MPs to ask Tory party members not back her

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and it is for Tory MPs to decide what approach they take in any leadership campaign.
